author: JamesWTruher
body:
# testability

this should include results from daily run as well as CI
see https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/testing-guidelines/TestRoadmap.md

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: @JamesWTruher isn't this technically done? Or are we leaving it open until we have good coverage numbers again?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: We should do this, but this doesn't block 6.0.0 release

title: PowerShell Core test result data should be available via public dashboard
